summary: This is an email chain regarding logistical preparations for a focus group exercise related to a jury trial, likely concerning the Epstein case. It involves coordination between US Attorney's Office personnel and a contractor to print questionnaires and jury instructions for a Saturday session.

events.title: Focus Group Session
events.description: A focus group exercise is scheduled for Saturday, involving jury deliberations simulation with questionnaires and verdict forms.

keyFacts: Document is an email chain dated September 23, 2021, about preparing for a focus group exercise.
The focus group involves jury instructions, questionnaires, and verdict forms for a simulated deliberation.
The exercise requires 40 copies of materials to be printed and stapled for participants.
The purpose is to analyze juror decision-making, including reasons for non-unanimous verdicts.
All personal names are redacted, shown as placeholders like (USANYS) or blank fields.
